Great quality.  Fit perfect
Not too heavy and easy to tuck a flowy shirt into.
Looks nicer than the pricetag would indicate.  I plan to use this for many different costumes!
The color was good, the material  was stiff and noisy like it was made of plastic, was expecting a softer feel. Size was okay.
Super comfortable! Great quality.
It is exactly as advertised. Fits perfect and will be great for my costume this year!
This skirt is perfect!! The quality is fantastic! I ordered a medium, which would be my normal size and it fits perfectly!! Just what I wanted and even better than expected!

I am between a size 4-6 and this skirt fit perfect . Great quality fabric as well. Buy it!

评论概述: Awesome skirt. Ordering in multiple colors.
评论详情: This is an awesome skirt and one of my favorites. I love that it is adjustable and comfortable. I only wish they had it in more colors. Would love it in an emerald green.

评论概述: Looks like the advertised item.  Size fits me at 5'5" and 180lbs
评论详情: It goes very well with a velvet short jacket I bought in Tombstone, AZ recently.  It's going to look very Victorian/Edwardian/Steampunk for many future events.  I also got one in blue.  I love the iridescent look to it.

Very nice quality. This is not a cheap costume looking skirt. It's well made and the fabric is beautiful. I got the red and I'm really wanting the blue too. The sizing recommended it get a medium but after reading reviews I ordered a small and it fit perfectly. The waist has a zipper for easy on and off. Will order again!
The style is cute. However the quality is like wearing a heavy a** tarp! Disgusting. If I wanted something like this I would’ve gotten it for cheaper. Not worth it. Save your money.
Beautiful fabric, great fit and easy to style for different looks

Got this awhile ago and just remembered to review it, so I don’t have a picture, sorry. I was so excited to get the skirt and fulfill my goth dreams but this was honestly more spirit Halloween vampire. The material was cheap and felt like an umbrella, and it was super wrinkly. It runs large, so it was too long and too big around the waist. Way too pricey for the quality

评论概述: Color and cut are exactly like the description!
评论详情: This skirt is to die for . The fit is very flattering and it can be made shorter or longer depending on how much leg you’re wanting to show . Very durable, ( as I spilled a smoothie all over the back with no cleaning problems after ) bright , flirty and fun !

Wonderful skirt! The waist zips up with a hidden zipper but there’s tons of room for hips and butt. Easily shifts from floor length up to can-can skirt and anywhere in between. The blue is a gorgeous iridescent periwinkle that is purple ish. Washes so well, you’d think it was just taken out of the bag. Not sheer or see-through at all. We’ve bought several Scarlett Darkness items and all have been keepers and great quality.

It was perfect for Pirate day in the Bay. This skirt, and the white variation I used for a petticoat are super soft, silky, lightweight and breezy.  It was in the 80s, but very airy under there. It flows and moves exactly perfect, with the most beautiful sheen, exactly as shown.  Will buy more of them in other colors. I have the blue taffeta, and the off white one, and saw several others in the red at the event. Absolutely wonderful!!

I have 15 dresses by this brand, but this was my first Scarlet Darkness skirt and I love it! I'm 5'3 and 140 pounds the small fit me a little bit snug but still comfortably enough to keep. It's versatile and the blue color is amazing! I can't wait to wear this at Oregon Country Fair this year!
Love the color and quality, worked great for our Western event.

I havent worn the skirt as yet, however, I know that it is a head turner. Ive tried it on enough times to ascertain that it is  of good material quality, beautiful, flowy to a degree, and adjusts easily. A great feature is the versatility of it, and so, it is like having 2 skirts in one.
Wife review. Bought as as part of a "princess" holiday outfit for a convention. Absolutely LOVE it. It's the perfect addition. 😍
The material is like a windbreaker
Used it for a little red riding hood costume and it was perfect. The skirt is adjustable in length in the front with the ties. Super comfy.

Great piece. I ordered it to wear for a costume ball and I'll be keeping it as a piece for costuming and cosplay. The color is a lovely wine burgundy with some luster, be careful matching red to it though unless it's dark red.

This feels like stiff taffeta and the fabric is cheaper in person than in the pictures. It arrived complete with the stains of the last person who wore it. I hope the skirt had a good night because I'll be returning it. Used worn clothing with stains sold as new. Gross.

Skirt fit as per the size guide. It was lovelier than I expected it to be! I bought it for a one time use for a costume wedding but I’m excited to add it to my costume wardrobe. Front length is easily adjustable, skirt has a nice weight to it (it doesn’t feel flimsy at all!). It’s very well made for the price.
Like it was to help me with my fashion

评论概述: Absolutely love this, better quality than expected
评论详情: I'm 5'8" 140lbs and bought a medium. The medium fit perfect. But I'm not a fit 140 I'm "skinny fat" or "doughy". If you're a fit 140 you might be ok with a small. The quality is way better than expected also. Like really pretty looking fabric for the price. Don't get me wrong it's still a cheap fabric but looks beautiful  and its comfortable. Can't wait to find an excuse to wear it again!

I bought this for a pirate costume and loved it. It’s super adjustable so you can choose the length of the front. It’s very cute and comfortable. I’ll probably buy it in other colors. (I Wish the red and black would come back!)
Love the skirt! Super cute. Gorgeous fabric.
Used it for senior pics and a halloween costume. It was very flowy and breathable.
beautiful product but I order it too big and didn't have time to order a new one for the party.
I love everything about this skirt! Easy to iron, and trust me it’s worth to do.
Was a cool look for my Halloween witch costume but honestly, this skirt can be used other times as well. Light weight, interesting style- would definitely recommend
Daughter used this for her pirate costume loooked amazing!

It fits true to size, it has a little give. The material is great!! It made my costume soooo much better! We won our costume contest!! It doesn’t feel flimsy. No catches or tears. The zipper worked perfect. This is a GREAT buy!

评论概述: Took my ren fair costume to the next level
评论详情: After being pleasantly surprised by a Scarlet Darkness corset, I decided to add this skirt from the same brand as an extra layer.  Again, the quality of the fabric, construction, and fullness did not disappoint!

评论概述: Super cheap awful material, buy elsewhere!
评论详情: The material is absolutely awful! It’s like the material you would use for a windbreaker, and sounds like it too. I’ve gotten this style of skirt before for a similar price except that one was made of normal clothing fabric. This is very thin, and noisy and has that sheen that makes it look super cheap, definitely not worth $55, this is the quality I would expect from like $25. If I had more time before the costume party I’d return it and try to get something else, but I don’t so I guess I have to keep it.

The skirt is great. Like others say in comments, it is a nice skirt and should do the trick for Halloween. The issue was with the size/exchange. After buying a medium, I decided I may need a large. The medium felt a bit too tight even considering there is an elastic. In the meantime, the price went up (about a day in between). I called Amazon and was told to return the medium, order the large, and then I would get a refund on the difference. I was skeptical but proceeded anyway only to find out the person advised me incorrectly. It seems that not everyone offers a free exchange of sizes. Had it not been for this issue, it would have been great but consider this if you feel you may be in between sizes.
Honestly surprised at how good the quality is. Doesn’t look cheap at all. There is a lot of wrinkles of course but nothing some wrinkle release spray can’t handle.

Great skirt. Tall girls will have their shoes visible somewhat but not an issue. Works great as a long skirt or steampunk ruffled skirt with the laces pulled  up. Love it! A bit tight around the hips but if you like wearing it a bit higher it'll work well. I kept the tighter fit to work with the corset.

Looks exactly as advertised.  Very comfortable, fit runs a bit loose.  I never got to wear it out though.  The second time I tried it on/ first time I was going to wear it the zipper broke.  Huge disappointment

评论用户: Sorry but definitely not what I thought. Fabric wasn't the same very small compared to what I ordered almost the kids size definitely not what it looks like or was talked about

The lack of waist band makes it not flattering. The material doesn't stretch at all.
Expect the unexpected. This turned out to be a pretty cool skirt. I like that it can be worn as a part of a costume or just as regular ware.
This skirt has been the icing on the cake for my pirate outfit. The color shift is so amazing!
Even more color gradience than it shows in the picture. This definitely doesn’t double as a casual piece, but I really wish it did because every time I put it on I never want to take it off.

评论概述: Absolutely beautiful and well made! Fits to size!!!

It’s gorgeous! Accurate to the pictures!!! Well made and comfortable.

Great fit. Perfect color.
Lovely fabric and  design.  Wow, just perfect!

I bought this for my wedding. I wanted something beautiful but also something I could wear again. This skirt is iridescent and looks purpley blue and a bit pink as well. It can go with many different tops, I got many compliments on this skirt.

评论概述: The color shifting lightweight fabric is amazing!

I love this skirt. I love that you can adjust the length in the front to be as modest or promiscuous as you want. The color is so pretty. It shifts based on how the light hits it. I wore it to the Renaissance festival and I saw at least three other people wearing the same one. It runs just a little bit big in the waist.

评论概述: The piece I get the most compliments on
评论详情: We're professional cosplayers/entertainers & Scarlet Darkness is the ONLY store I purchase our gear from. Either directly from the website or the Amazon store. Vendors at shows hate me because I walk right by their booths & exclaim "Darling, read the label. Buy it directly from Scarlet Darkness on Amazon & you save enough to buy 2 more or an entire outfit. They have a website too. But seriously, the day I purchased this I was holding it in my hand for $80, passed it to my husband & right in front of the vendor & 3 customers, I purchased it for $23 on a flash sale & showed them all the deal I just got. I understand owning a small business & mark ups on the merchandise but I draw the line where greed jacks the price up to 3 times the cost or higher. I've lost count of how many people I have sent directly to your store & web pages so they can buy directly from you & have the added protection of should they ever need to exchange or as a question they can. For me that honestly makes more sense & is a win/win. You get the purchases & we get beautiful gear at an even more beautiful price AND reliable customer service should we ever need it.  (Yup, East Coast show vendors, I'm THAT Sea Witch 😉)

This skirt is so very soft and yummy! Love! Love! Love!  As usual, perfect fit! Gorgeous colors and looks awesome on me no matter what length it is! The ONLY thing I dislike about S. D. is the fact that I can't afford EVERYTHING! 🤑😏🥴
Dressed me beautiful

评论概述: Runs a size big. Very beautiful
评论详情: So for whatever reason they made me re do my review. Not my fault the skirt looks hot on me! It's a great skirt. When you first get it your gonna have to steam it as its severely wrinkled from being in a bag folded. Once done you will see all its glory.  I now have two, the black skirt and navy, which is like a gorgeous jewel!! I wish I would have bought xl instead of xxl like the size chart says. It goes low on my hips and is a long skirt, which I love. Next time xl.  My measurements are 44-36-49 220lbs 5'8". Hope this helps. I been wearing these in the heat. Even layered and have not been too hot. I cinch the top one up to show the bottom. Can't wait to get more colors for layering fun.  Would be great for a Nadja cosplay or steampunk, anything Victorian. I wear with a corset myself. Got a lot of attention in this.

评论概述: Loved it, It turned out beautiful!
评论详情: I love the way my entire outfit turned out. The skirt was stunning and sexy.

评论概述: Sizing is incorrect and runs small
评论详情: I like how they look and the fabric is light weight, perfect for Ren faire outfits but.. I purchased 3 skirts, same sizes different colors. Two of them fit, one doesn't, it was at least 2" smaller than the others. I had to return it, which is a bummer because that's the one I really liked, the other 2 were my Just in case picks In addition the two that did fit were more like 1xl than 2xl. I'm a size 20 and they are tight.

评论概述: SO comfortable! Flattering. Looks great! Fun stuff. LOVE THIS
评论详情: LOVE THIS! It's so comfortable, hides my tummy, shows my legs, rustles a bit, and is lightweight with an almost vinyl feel. Perfect to go with my Renaissance outfit.

I have worn this skirt twice now to Ren Faires. It's gorgeous, the color shift is magical in the sunlight. I love it. You can adjust the height of the front part with the draw strings for different looks. It's comfy and I have no complaints.

This skirt is gorgeous, much nicer than I expected!  I got it in navy blue but it's more a twilight blue with purple color shift. The fabric is a nice rustly midweight taffeta. True to size, I'm a size 18 big booty cutie and the 2XL fits perfectly. It says pull-on, but there's actually a side zipper and elastic at the back of the waist, so it's super easy to wear. Excellent quality for the price, it doesn't look cheap or costume-y. I got it for a fairycore look for Black Fae Day but it would also be perfect for goth and steampunk looks. I'm planning to get another one in black. Buy this skirt, you'll be glad you did!

评论概述: Great addition to my costume bin!
评论详情: Bought this for a vampire gala and it's perfect. Nicely made, washes easily, and makes a fun swishing sound. Easy to tie up the front 2 ribbons or you can let those out and wear it to the ankles. It was very wrinkled when I got it, which I didn't mind. I ran a mild iron over it and the wrinkles totally came out after I wore and washed it.
This is a beautiful skirt. I purchased 2 but I won't be purchasing anymore because the zip broke the first time I wore one. The return window will not allow me an exchange. Disappointing
This item looks exactly like the picture. The material is great and shimmers.  This item does run small.
Reminds me of cheap 80's dress up clothes. Super disappointed. So many good reviews and then I felt punked. Basically windbreaker material.

评论概述: Great skirt for pirate or steampunk
评论详情: I got this as a skirt for when we go to renaissance festivals and dress as pirates.  Love the color and the adjustability of the front length.  I am 5’0” and it is to the ground but I wanted it that way.  The zipper makes it easy to get on and off.  I have 38” hips and a 30” waist and a medium fits perfectly.  I love it!!  Highly recommend and will look for other ways to wear it!

The material is insanely cheap, it’s literally like wearing a tarp shaped into a skirt. It looks really cute and it’s functional if you only need it for a specific event, but the material is literally loud and crinkly when you move. Not suitable for just general wear at all.

Bought this for the Renaissance Fair in AZ and it worked perfectly with a corset. The material is definitely very costume-ish so i dont know that I would wear it on a normal day but I will keep it for future dress-up opportunities!

There are no words to describe the way the blue shimmers when the light catches it; the color is simply extraordinary. Every time I wear this skirt around town, random people stop and compliment-- men, women, young, old-- it's totally amazing. This skirt is like stepping into another realm, full of glamour and probably dragons or knights.  BUY ITTTTTT!!!!

This skirt is what I bought for my music video :) I think it worked great for all the movement I put it through. It doesn’t weigh you down at all. I feel like it is flattering and hides the tummy area well. Definitely recommend! You just need to steam the wrinkles out.
Fabric has a plastic feel, the zipper was open, but the pull wouldn't move...returned

评论概述: Great fit on my slender 11 year old
评论详情: Great fit on my slender 11 year old, she enjoyed being able to wear the skirt shorter for trick or treating and down for the school dance.

评论概述: Creases in the front are weird at first.
评论详情: I like it. I had to play around with it a lot to get it to look a little better on me. It could potentially be my body shape. I wore it and liked it. You can pull where the creases are down and it is a normal skirt… which is very nice also, you can make it longer or shorter or have a regular skirt

Loved this skirt it flows nicely washes in washing machine without issues. The color is beautiful. Hard to match an exact blue or purple if you are very “OCD” about matching but I provided two pics so you can compare. I’m 5”5 about 140lbs went with medium and it’s perfect. It has a zipper on the side minimal stretch on this fabric. U can always untie the front for a lengthier skirt. It’s too hot I’m Miami so this gives a nice airflow! 😉
Super well made! Fit perfect (Small - I wear 2/4 in slacks and 26/27 in jeans) The fabric is wonderful - I would highly recommend
I like the color. I like that it drags a little bit in the back.
I love vintage- I wear this skirt quite often and get a lot of compliments. I like to pair with a more modern top so it doesn't look 'too much'
Just buy it! Got a lot of compliments. Red color have this black shine. When your walking it flows so nicely against the wind.

评论概述: They sent the wrong color, otherwise 5 stars!
评论详情: I ordered the black skirt, but they sent me the wine colored one. It is gorgeous and fits perfectly! At first I was disappointed to see the mix up, but the color shift in the red is amazing, and I'm happy to have it! Maybe next time I'll receive the correct color.
Super cute. Looks just like the picture. Has nice strech in back.
It was alittle big on me but it was pretty nice. Looked great
Item was damaged

Bought as a period (1800s) costume for providing historical accounts of the person I portray. The beauty of this product is you can make it steam punk and pulled up by the drawstrings or in my case leave it draw the skirt down for the look and feel I needed. Gaining a few pounds I needed something a bit forgiving. This was the product. Compliments on my find.
I chose "navy blue" based off of photos I saw in reviews. It's just a medium soft blue with a purple shift.  Very pretty.
Just love this color. So spectacular. Hope to find more items in this kind of material.

评论概述: Skirt is beautiful!!!! Fabric is so pretty and iridescent
评论详情: Runs a tad on the smaller side, so order a size up
Love the skirt! It's so fun and easy to adjust. I can't wait to wear it next year. :)

I ordered a medium as my waist is 28 inches (I followed the side guide) but the skirt felt big and wasn’t sitting at my waist properly. Fortunately this wasn’t too much a problem as my shirt sits over the waist. The waistband does have a bit of elastic so if you were unsure about what size to get, I would size down if you wanted a truer fit or get your size if you want it to be a bit bigger.  The length in the front of the skirt can be adjusted. In the first picture I have it pulled a bit higher so my shoes are visible! It looks really nice at whatever length though. There is a hidden zipper on the side.  I’m almost 5’6 and the bottom of the back of the skirt was an inch or two above the floor without shoes. If you wanted a small train, unless you’re under 5’4 this may not be the item for you. I do not mind the length at all because trains at renn fairs can be stressful as everyone ends up stepping on your clothes and ruining the fabric :(  Overall, 9.5/10 for this skirt! 9.5 because the sizing is not accurate to the size guide

This skirt is very well made!!! I have a bigger booty and thinner waste, it fit perfect! There is 0 stretch, so if that is what you need this isn’t it. Shipping take a bit of time but worth it, I would absolutely buy this in every color! If I had the use for them 😬

评论概述: Love the color! Not sure if I’m wearing it correctly though.
评论详情: I’ve never have dressed like this before. I absolutely love the color and wanted to stand out a little bit at the Dickens fair. Not sure if I’m wearing it correctly with the large petticoat underneath. Most of the other pictures don’t show a petticoat. Hopefully I’m not inappropriate.😬
Got the skirt for a costume. Light weight. Fits good.
This is made of Halloween material and looks like a paper bag on. Truly a tragedy they’re selling this skirt at such a high price. Returning this immediately.

This skirt worked for what I got it for. Cinched up nicely and looked cute. The material is kind of a costumey material, but not itchy or uncomfortable. It worked perfectly for my renaissance festival costume!
